properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 5:09AM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Winter Weather Advisories for Portions of Central and Southern
Wyoming through this evening...

.Snow will occur today into this evening. The snow is likely to
persist across southern Wyoming through late this evening. The
combination of snow and wind could create hazardous travel in some
locations.

* WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches at the
lower elevations. Snowfall of 5 to 9 inches on Casper mountain.

* WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain.

* WHEN...Now until 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor driving
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY
